name: Wizzy
description:
Simulate your creativity packed colourful experience with Under The Waterways.

It is a simulation of an underwater experience with a submarine. The submarine is customizable and several skins can be unlocked by earning more and more fishlings.

Hearts are collected during the gameplay so as to increase health by 10.

Sea urchins and piranhas damage your health! 

5 seconds of AFK will damage your health!

Skins can only be bought once . After quitting if you wish to buy them again then you'd have to earn the coins again.

Your coins will be saved automatically.
